body: Do you have in mind a website doc or a wiki? Answers custom written for the purpose, or a collection of links, perhaps with commentary? I'm very sympathetic to the need here, since I slowly and painstakingly taught myself much of this based on the code and code reviews (and regularly continue to do so)...but there's also a whole lot of possible topics, many of which are intricate, and the material ages fast. It'd be very easy to bite off a chunk too big to chew.
